divs: Sighting Detailsmy girl was siting in the chair smoking a cigerett and observed it out the window. I watched it thinking it was a plane cause of the colors. after 10 min I noticed it did not move , so I went to the store and bought binoculars and came back and it was still there I could see it more clear and it look like it was way up in the stratosphere and had to be real big for me to see it .......
Summary: it was like watching a christmas tree blinking and it was stationary a long time its still there..NE sky low in the horizon
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in East Providence
There were no other sightings in East Providence on or around October 22nd 2011
